name: The Happy Snail & The Lost Ant
name_original: The Happy Snail & The Lost Ant
description:
This is a short interactive story made for Spinoff's second interactive story jam. The overarching theme for the jam was "love". I actually had a story in mind before the theme was announced but I think it fit quite well with the theme of love as the story focuses on self-love and friendship.

The idea for this game was sparked by an idea I had for a children's book. I thought, "What better way to test it out?" than through this interactive medium. There are other themes I touch upon throughout the story such as accessibility (or sadly, lack of) as well as acceptance of oneself and others. It is a story that embraces the philosophies of diversity, inclusion, and equity, which are all very close to my heart.
